# perform(_:)

**Instance Method**

Performs one or more framework requests on the handler’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
final func perform<each T>(_ request: repeat each T) async throws -> (repeat (each T).Result) where repeat each T : TargetedRequest
```

## Performing the request

- **perform(_:)**: Performs a framework request on the handler’s image.
- **performAll(_:)**: Schedules a collection of framework requests to perform on the handler’s image.
